short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Content Server Browser Web Extension for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The OpenText Content Server Browser Web Extension helps you perform a variety of tasks when accessing Content Server web interface through Chrome. This extension gives you access to functionality provided by Content Server desktop components.
